name: Pumpkin Cheesecake (Pack of 2)
summary: Put your PSL down for a moment and whip up a delectable Pumpkin Cheesecake packed with all the fall flavours! This dessert will be the talk of every Thanksgiving dinner, festive feast, and family dinner night and the amazing part is, itâ€™s so easy to make! Just mix the ingredients, pour the blend into a pie crust (use premade shells to keep things easy), pop it in the oven, and enjoy that nice pumpkin spice.
